text: Hollywood Cavalcade is a 1939 American drama movie directed by Irving Cummings and starring Alice Faye, Don Ameche, J. Edward Bromberg, Al Jolson, Donald Meek, Buster Keaton, Irving Bacon, Hank Mann. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1939 comedy movies Category:1939 drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Irving Cummings Category:Movies directed by Malcolm St. Clair
title: Hollywood Cavalcade
